scenario.name: rup2_Incoming_Call
scenario.send: SIP/2.0 183 Session Progress [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=[call_number] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Require: 100rel Rseq: 1 Contact: <sip:rup2@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq: [cseq] PRACK Contact: <sip:rup2@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Content-Length: 0
SIP/2.0 180 Ringing [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq: 1 INVITE Require: 100rel RSeq: 2 Contact: <sip:rup2@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Content-Length: 0

SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=[call_number] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq:1 INVITE Contact: <sip:rup2@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]

BYE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 BYE Contact: sip:rup2@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0
